#include "bits/stdc++.h"
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

int main() {
	//seive(1000000);
	ll t,i,n,fib[1000],j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	cin>>n;
	
	fib[0]=1;fib[1]=1;
	for(i=2;i<1000;i++)
	fib[i]=fib[i-1]+fib[i-2];
	//cout<<fib[20]<<endl;
	i=0;//cout<<char(fib[1]+64);
	while(i<n)
	{
		fib[i]%=26;
		if(!fib[i]) cout<<"Z";
		//cout<<fib[i];
		else
		cout<<char(fib[i]+64);
		i++;
	}
	cout<<endl;
	
	}
	return 0;
}
